src.enums
Enum Shops

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Shops>
      src.enums.Shops
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Shops>
public enum Shops
extends java.lang.Enum<Shops>

Enum to keep track of the different shops that can exist in the world. Each shop has a shop type integer associated with it to use with the map format.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07

setImageLocation

public void setImageLocation(java.lang.String str)
Sets the image location of this shop. Can be used when reading in the physics for a scenario.

Parameters:
str - String : path to image

getType

public int getType()
Accessor for this shop's type. This number is used for the map format.

Returns:
int : type of shop
